1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0: presents now generate in cold biomes, updated wrapped present textures, reduced maximal amount of tnt in a (crafted) present to 1
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0:
empty presents and presents can now be crafted with dye to change their color/ribbon color,
tweaked worldgen a bit
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.0:
fixed a bug randomly breaking recipes,
fixed a bug crashing servers,
potion effects now spawn immediately instead of being launched upwards
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.1: no longer prints 'd' in console every time a recipe matches that of a wrapped present
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.2:
fixed worldgen crashes on servers,
fixed present coloring not working on servers
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.3:
added config with option for world gen chance,
decreased chance for cake in generated presents
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.4: presents now have tooltips with their contents when held by the player that crafted them
